name: mcp-jira-tools
description: Tool descriptors for local MCP-style JSON-RPC server that integrates with Jira

tools.name: create_issue
tools.title: Create Jira issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in Jira. Parameters: projectKey, summary, description, issuetype

tools.name: update_issue
tools.title: Update Jira issue
tools.description: Update fields on an existing Jira issue. Parameters: issueKey, fields(object)

tools.name: get_issue
tools.title: Get Jira issue
tools.description: Fetch a Jira issue by key. Parameters: issueKey

tools.name: search_issues
tools.title: Search Jira issues
tools.description: Search Jira using JQL. Parameters: jql, maxResults (optional)
